speaker: Louise Han
title: The Latest from Azure Multivariate Anomaly Detection
description:
As Multivariate anomaly detection goes from public preview to GA, Louise Han stops by to talk about what's new and gives us a demo of the latest features!

Chapters:
00:00 Welcome to the AI Show
00:17 Welcome Louise Han
00:43 What is Azure Multivariate Anomaly Detection
01:35 Demo
03:55 Anomaly contributors
05:11 How to use the Multivariate Anomaly Detection API
11:19 Q&A
12:59 Learn more
13:51 Wrap
